0.0.2.name: wordpress/selflink
0.0.2.description:
Too often, you'll need to add a hyperlink to a post itself in your WordPress? blog due to many reasons, protecting your intellectual property for example. Remember how you made it? Boring enough?

Yes, because the post hasn't been published yet, you have to use preview to see the URL of the post, you set the Permalink manually or you know the postId of the post and set the hyperlink yourself.

This plugin can save you a lot efforts. It will automatically add the link to the post itself when visitors viewing your post.
